org.crsh.command

Interface CommandContext<P>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Appendable, AutoCloseable, Closeable, Consumer<P>, Flushable, InteractionContext, RuntimeContext, Screenable, ScreenContext
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    InvocationContext<P>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommandInvokerAdapter, CRaSHProcessContext, InvocationContextImpl, PipeLineInvocationContext

    public interface CommandContext<P>
extends Consumer<P>, InteractionContext, RuntimeContext, Closeable
    The command context provides the services for invoking a command.
    Author:
    Julien Viet
